name: order_list_by_time
title: Order List By Time
description: A list of  orders by time
statement:
SELECT
  order_id,
  customer_id,
  CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name, ' (', country, ')') as employee,
  order_timestamp,
  required_date,
  shipped_date
FROM orders
INNER JOIN employees ON employees.employee_id = orders.employee_id
WHERE
  order_timestamp >= ${order_after} AND
  order_timestamp <= $order_before AND
  shipped_date >= $shipped_after AND
  shipped_date <= $shipped_before
